DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria . Healthy men . BMI 3040 . Fasting blood glucose < 7 mM . Stable body weight last 2 month . Exclusion Criteria . High intake alcohol . Medication affect glucose lipid metabolism . Allergy towards important food item diet . Inflammatory bowel disease . Surgery use antibiotic last 2 month .
